attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app gave my phone many viruses some of of which make my phone randomly pop up pictures of a Cheeto 😣😔😟

attributes.title: This app is so ew
attributes.review: This app is just absolutely HORRIBLE. I didn't even have to open it to know everything about it is just absolutely disgusting #SETTLEFORBIDEN2020 🧚🏽‍♀️✨

attributes.title: OFFENSIVE
attributes.review: In so many ways this app is offensive do not download if you’re ready to see a big orange man looking at you screaming “make America great again”

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: He takes away things that people enjoy most, he jumps to conclusions and mr Cheeto will no longer boss us around 😤✊🏽

attributes.title: This app hacks you!!
attributes.review: I opened this app and almost immediately my phone bugged out and shut down. I’m now using my 2007 iPad...
I downloaded the app assuming I would open my view to a more political stance. Instead I was greeted with a stale Cheeto with stringy cotton candy hair. Very disappointed 🙊🙈

attributes.title: NO❤️😋
attributes.review: i open the app to find a cheeto on my screen next thing i know i’m sitting in the living room manifesting tr*mp 202* 😡 -0/10 do not recommend. chair but make it electric. eat dirt trump. GEN Z shall rise 😄✨🥶😻👁🤪😜🥰😱

attributes.title: Black Lives Matter! No Human is Illegal on stollen land!!
attributes.review: Black lives matter!! No human is illegal on stolen land!! America is a horrible country and our president is terrible 🤢 if you support trump keep that to urself that’s embarrassing

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: Really a let down. The bar was set low and still I was disappointed.

THIS APP WILL MAKE YOU WANNA PUKE....... I KNOW A FEW PEOPLE WHO DIED BECAUSE OF THIS APP. SOME PEOPLE GOT STUCK BEHIND A WALL. EVERY TIME YOU OPEN THE APP A BACKGROUND STORY IS TOLD AND IT SAYS “TRUMP IS A MISTAKE THAT WAS A MISTAKE THAT WAS A MISTAKE”. Oh and ps: the only way to make America great again is with him out of the picture and not building walls...
